root.name: Puffins: Let's Roll
root.description: Help make momma puffin happy by guiding her egg safely to the nest. In Puffins: Let’s Roll users will navigate a giant puffin through multiple Atlantic Canadian inspired levels. The game takes a style similar to Marble Madness. The user swipes the touch screen to maneuver obstacles and solve simple puzzles; all in an attempt to get the egg safely home to momma.
